Message: The user completes the submission of the form
I would like to know the reason why my ads are still pending for approval.

If your ads are still pending approval, it might be due to a few reasons. If your account is new and hasn't been verified yet, this could be causing the delay. To proceed with the verification process, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days once everything is in order. Let me know if you need further assistance!
How do I obtain an EHID or DUNS number?

An EHID (Employer Identification Number) is typically obtained through the IRS for tax purposes, while a DUNS number is issued by Dun & Bradstreet for business identification. You can apply for an EIN through the IRS website, and you can request a DUNS number from Dun & Bradstreet's website. If you need more detailed guidance on obtaining these numbers, feel free to ask!
